## ğŸ¸ CoreTet Preflight Checklist

### Universal Checks
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] No new `any` types introduced

### Responsive
- [ ] Works at 375px (mobile)
- [ ] Works at 1440px (desktop)
- [ ] Touch targets are â‰¥44px on mobile

### States (if UI change)
- [ ] Loading state exists and looks good
- [ ] Error state exists and is helpful
- [ ] Empty state exists and guides user
- [ ] Disabled state is visually distinct

### Accessibility
- [ ] Keyboard navigable (tab order makes sense)
- [ ] Focus states visible
- [ ] Labels associated with inputs
- [ ] Sufficient color contrast

### Audio (if audio-related)
- [ ] Playback works reliably
- [ ] Progress/seeking is smooth
- [ ] Handles missing/corrupt files gracefully
- [ ] Doesn't break cross-navigation persistence
- [ ] Tested on mobile (autoplay restrictions)

### Data
- [ ] Optimistic UI where appropriate
- [ ] Reverts gracefully on failure
- [ ] No loading flicker

### CoreTet Specific
- [ ] Matches existing design patterns
- [ ] A non-technical musician could use this
- [ ] Doesn't add social/viral features
- [ ] Privacy-respecting (who sees what?)
